discription: I am a React Developer at this company. My role is to convert all figma design into a working React Project using MVVM approach, Implementing Redux on every React Project including api integration and validation. I also created some React package and publish to our private npm server.
As Front End Developer in this company. My role was to override the existing moodle design to meet the UI/Ux Design using scss, javascript and jquery

I am a javascript developer in this company, working on a frontend using vanilla javascript, Vue.js,html5, bootstrap and jquery. At the same time, since we are using an open source tool which is developed in Javascript and python, I also used basic python on a backend. I was involved with several projects in this company.

It is project based, My role on this project is for UI Development, Codally Tech is working on a project called A+ Learning platform which serves as an online school during pandemic. We work as a team and use Agile Methodology. The entire UI project is developed using Next.js and Material UI.
This is not usually a company job but a bootcamp. The reason why I included this is to showcase all the personal projects that we develop for the entire 3 months of bootcamp.

This is also a project based. They already have their website but itâ€™s totally outdated. My role here is to update and convert their website into the latest React.js Library. It takes 3 months including API integration and payment using paypal
